pullrequest.title: Unicode strings and other Python 3 forward-compatible changes.

content.raw:
Ok so after applying the diff everything is running smoothly. Files with non unicode filenames can run, save data and the hdf files can be loaded again without problems. 
Also I tried the changes with the 'update dataframe' pull request changes and everything seems to be compatible.

I might do some testing under python 3 in the hopes that lyse might be fully python 3 compatible with these changes. But that is another pull request entirely if not so I'll approve of this with the diffs as it does what it says and doesn't seem to break stuff.
content.html:
Ok so after applying the diff everything is running smoothly. Files with non unicode filenames can run, save data and the hdf files can be loaded again without problems. Also I tried the changes with the 'update dataframe' pull request changes and everything seems to be compatible.

I might do some testing under python 3 in the hopes that lyse might be fully python 3 compatible with these changes. But that is another pull request entirely if not so I'll approve of this with the diffs as it does what it says and doesn't seem to break stuff.
